## Bio

At Elucidata, I bring together my passion for computers, infatuation with biology, and a relentless drive to solve complex problems through data. With a Master of Technology from the Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology and a Master's in Biotechnology from Gautam Buddha University, I have built a strong foundation in computational biology and biotechnology.

Since joining in October 2022, I have been leveraging my expertise in transcriptomics, machine learning, and Python to advance research and drive innovation in bioinformatics. My work is focused on seamlessly integrating complex data analysis with biological insights, enabling meaningful advancements in our understanding of biology and contributing to cutting-edge discoveries.

Fueled by curiosity and a commitment to making a difference, I thrive on tackling challenging questions and turning data into actionable knowledge that pushes the boundaries of science.
